name: BeeTogether
intro: Supporting Non-Profit-Organisations with fundraising based on cryptocurrency
introduce: BeeTogether is connecting NGOs with NFT and blockchain artists to gain visibility, raise awareness, and enhance fundraising efforts. BeeTogether also provides NFT stores for artists on the NEAR blockchain via MintBase. And with each artist or piece of art tied to a specific cause, people can directly support both nonprofits and NFT artists.
